text: One of West Virginiaâ€™s first public institutions of higher education, Marshall University was founded as Marshall Academy in 1837 and named after Chief Justice of the Supreme Court John Marshall (1755-1835). The institution became Marshall College in 1858 and attained university status in 1961. ==References== Category:1837 establishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in the United States
title: Marshall College
